alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:00AM CDT until April 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro affecting Jackson County. Big Muddy River near Plumfield affecting Franklin and Williamson Counties. For the Big Muddy River...including Plumfield, Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling to 20.6 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
